mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_id AS memId, m.mem_email AS memEmail, m.mem_tel AS memTel, m.mem_name AS memName, cm.corp_mem_dept AS corpDepartment, m.mem_no AS memNo, ci.corp_name AS corpName FROM MEMBER m JOIN CORP_MEM cm ON m.mem_no = cm.mem_no JOIN CORP_INFO ci ON cm.corp_no = ci.corp_no WHERE m.mem_id = #{memId}
